description.value: If the character has gained at least 3 Pain Tokens during an encounter, they may spend a Fate Point to gain Unnatural Strength (x2) for the remainder of the Encounter. Unnatural Strength: Double Strength Bonus, gain 2 free Degrees of Success on all successful strength tests.
